home.whyChooseUsDescription: We focus on making car rental simpler, clearer, and more reliable by bringing the right partners and technology together.
home.whyChooseUsFeature1Description: Access a broad range of vehicles through our network of local rental partners, all available via a single booking platform.
home.whyChooseUsFeature2Description: Competitive pricing with clear terms, designed to give you value without unnecessary complexity or hidden costs.
home.whyChooseUsFeature3Description: A carefully designed booking flow that prioritizes clarity, consistency, and smooth vehicle pickup.
home.dedicatedJourneyDescription: From your first search to vehicle pickup, we focus on making the process clear, simple, and straightforward.
home.dedicatedJourneyFeature1Description: Straightforward options, transparent pricing, and a user-friendly booking experience.
home.dedicatedJourneyFeature2Description: Choose between partial or full online payment, with all payment details clearly shown in advance.
home.dedicatedJourneyFeature3Description: We work with local rental partners to provide availability and pricing through a single, centralized platform.

about.heroSubtitle: Connecting travelers with trusted local car rental providers worldwide
about.introductionText: Xdrive Mobility is a global vehicle rental distribution and booking platform, connecting travelers with carefully selected local car rental providers through a centralized technology and distribution infrastructure. Operating across 20+ countries, we enable access to reliable and scalable car rental options under the Xdrive brand, delivered by trusted local partners with strong market expertise. Our model combines local operational know-how with centralized brand governance, distribution management, and partner integrations to ensure consistent service standards, operational efficiency, and transparency across all markets. By aligning global demand with trusted local expertise, Xdrive Mobility delivers a seamless booking experience for customers while supporting sustainable growth for its partners worldwide.
about.benefit1Description: What you see is what you pay. Rates include essential coverages, location fees, and applicable taxes — no surprises at pickup.
about.benefit2Description: No unexpected extras. Your total cost is confirmed at booking, with no last-minute additions.
about.benefit3Description: Trusted partners worldwide. Access a wide selection of vehicles through well-established international and local rental providers.
about.benefit4Description: Support whenever you need it. Our team is available around the clock via phone, chat, and email.
about.benefit5Description: Smart value, reliable service. We focus on delivering strong prices without compromising rental quality.
about.benefit6Description: Plans changed? No problem. Cancel free of charge up to 72 hours before pickup in most locations.

franchise.heroSubtitle: Grow your local car rental business with global distribution
franchise.heroDescription: Join Xdrive Mobility and expand your reach through international broker and OTA channels while maintaining full operational control of your business.
franchise.introductionText1: Xdrive Mobility connects trusted local car rental companies with global demand through a centralized and structured distribution network.
franchise.introductionText2: We support our partners by managing international sales channels, visibility, and distribution strategy—allowing you to focus on delivering reliable and high-quality local service.
franchise.businessModel3: Flexible payment structures depending on channel and destination
franchise.businessModel4: One strong partner per destination (where applicable)
franchise.businessModel6: Operational autonomy at the local level
franchise.feature1Description: We generate international demand and direct it to your destination while you manage the local operation and service delivery.
franchise.feature2Description: Your fleet is distributed across multiple international platforms, increasing exposure and booking potential.
franchise.feature3Description: Our success depends on your performance—creating a partnership focused on sustainable, long-term growth.
franchise.feature4Description: We handle channel requirements, content standards, and positioning to maximize conversion and reliability.
franchise.feature5Description: Our model is designed to support partners who want to grow without losing operational control.
franchise.offer1: Access to international broker & OTA channels
franchise.offer4: Content & data guidance (fleet, policies, pick-up details, visuals)
franchise.systemAccessSubtitle: Xdrive Mobility provides its partners with system access and XML connectivity to manage availability, pricing, and operational content within our distribution infrastructure.
franchise.system1: Centralized system access for rate and availability management
franchise.system2: XML connectivity aligned with broker and OTA technical requirements
franchise.systemNote: Integration scope and technical setup are defined during the onboarding process.
franchise.step1Description: We review your destination, fleet capacity, service standards, and growth potential.
franchise.step2Description: Partnership structure, territory scope, and operational terms are defined transparently.
franchise.step3Description: Fleet lists, rental policies, deposits, extras, meeting points, and visuals are prepared and structured.
franchise.step4Description: Your inventory is activated across selected broker and OTA channels.
franchise.step5Description: We continuously refine pricing, availability, and content to improve performance and booking volume.
franchise.whoWeLookForText: We partner with companies that offer:
franchise.requirement6: Willingness to scale with increasing demand
franchise.faq1Question: Do you work with exclusive partners?
franchise.faq1Answer: In many destinations, we prefer working with a single strong partner to protect long-term growth and market positioning.
franchise.faq2Question: Do I need XML integration to work with Xdrive Mobility?
franchise.faq2Answer: XML integration is available as part of our system infrastructure. The setup approach depends on destination, volume, and operational structure.
franchise.faq3Answer: Payment structures depend on the broker, channel, and destination and are clarified during onboarding.
franchise.faq4Question: How long does it take to go live?
franchise.faq4Answer: Once documentation and content are complete, activation can begin immediately after channel approvals.

faq.heroSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about booking, payments, and our services
faq.paymentProcessQ: How does the payment process work?
faq.paymentProcessA: Depending on the selected payment option, you may pay either a partial amount or the full rental cost online via the Xdrive Mobility platform. If applicable, the remaining balance is paid directly to the Rental Provider at vehicle pickup.
faq.payPartA: "Pay Part" means you make a partial advance payment online to confirm your booking. The remaining balance is paid directly to the Rental Provider at vehicle pickup.
faq.payFullA: "Pay Full" means you pay the total rental amount online in advance via the Xdrive Mobility platform.
faq.paymentMethodsA: Only credit cards are accepted for online payments made via the Xdrive Mobility platform.
faq.rentalPriceQ: What is included in the rental price?
faq.rentalPriceA: Included services are shown during the booking process and may vary depending on the Rental Provider. Please review the price details before confirming your reservation.
faq.additionalFeesA: Certain charges such as optional extras, local taxes, or young driver fees may be payable directly to the Rental Provider at pickup.
faq.securityDepositA: Most Rental Providers require a refundable security deposit at pickup. Deposits are typically refunded within up to 30 business days after the rental ends, depending on the Rental Provider and the issuing bank.
faq.modifyBookingA: Booking modifications depend on the Rental Provider's terms. Please contact our support team for assistance.
faq.cancelBookingA: Free cancellation is available up to 72 hours before the scheduled pickup time. For cancellations made within 72 hours of pickup, cancellation protection may be available for purchase during booking, subject to the applicable terms. Detailed cancellation, refund, and liability terms are governed by the Distance Sales Agreement (Advance Booking & Prepayment Terms).
faq.flightDelayedQ: What happens if my flight is delayed?
faq.flightDelayedA: If you have provided your flight details, some Rental Providers may monitor delays. However, we recommend contacting the Rental Provider directly in case of significant delays.
faq.documentsRequiredQ: What documents are required at pickup?
faq.documentsRequiredA: You typically need a valid driver's license, a credit card in the main driver's name, and your booking confirmation. Additional documents may be required depending on the location.
faq.cashPaymentQ: Can I pay the remaining balance in cash?
faq.cashPaymentA: Accepted payment methods at pickup depend on the Rental Provider's policy. Please review the Rental Provider's terms before arrival.
faq.additionalDriverQ: Can someone else drive the car?
faq.additionalDriverA: Additional drivers may be allowed depending on the Rental Provider's policy and may be subject to an extra charge.
faq.rentalServiceA: Xdrive Mobility operates as a booking and distribution platform. The car rental service is provided by local rental companies.
faq.contactIssueQ: Who should I contact if I have an issue?
faq.contactIssueA: For booking or online payment-related questions, please contact Xdrive Mobility support. For vehicle-related or on-site issues, please contact the Rental Provider directly.
faq.insuranceA: No. Xdrive Mobility does not sell insurance products. Any insurance or protection options are offered solely by the Rental Provider under their own terms.
faq.paymentSecureA: Yes. All online payments made through the Xdrive Mobility platform are processed using secure payment systems.
faq.rentalTermsQ: Where can I find the full rental terms?
faq.rentalTermsA: The full rental terms and conditions are available during the booking process and in your confirmation email.

termsPage.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
termsPage.introText1: These Terms and Conditions of Use ("Terms") govern access to and use of the Xdrive Mobility website and related digital platforms (the "Site").
termsPage.introText2: Xdrive Mobility is operated by Salih Yavuz, based in Istanbul, Turkey ("Xdrive", "we", "us", "our").
termsPage.introText3: By accessing or using the Site and/or completing a reservation, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the Site.
termsPage.roleText1: Xdrive Mobility operates a brand-led vehicle rental booking, distribution, and payment facilitation platform. Xdrive Mobility does not provide transportation services or vehicle rental services directly.
termsPage.roleText2: Xdrive Mobility does not own, lease, manage, operate, or rent vehicles. All vehicles and rental services are provided and operated by local vehicle rental providers ("Rental Providers"), who retain responsibility for fleet ownership, vehicle operations, staffing, and compliance with applicable local laws and regulations.
termsPage.roleText3: Rental Providers deliver rental services under the Xdrive Mobility brand in accordance with applicable brand and service standards. The use of the Xdrive Mobility brand is limited to service delivery and does not transfer operational or legal responsibility to Xdrive Mobility.
termsPage.roleText4: For the avoidance of doubt, Xdrive Mobility is not a party to any vehicle rental agreement. The rental agreement governing the use of the vehicle is concluded exclusively between the customer and the relevant Rental Provider at the time of vehicle pickup.
termsPage.roleText5: Under no circumstances shall Xdrive Mobility be considered the vehicle owner, operator, lessor, or rental service provider.
termsPage.useText1: The Site is provided for personal, non-commercial use only.
termsPage.useList1: use the Site for unlawful or fraudulent purposes;
termsPage.useList2: interfere with the Site's functionality, security, or availability;
termsPage.useList4: copy, reproduce, or exploit Site content without authorization.
termsPage.useText3: Xdrive reserves the right to restrict or terminate access in cases of misuse or violation of these Terms.
termsPage.reservationsText1: Reservations are made through the Site and are subject to availability.
termsPage.reservationsText2: Reservation confirmation does not guarantee a specific vehicle make or model unless expressly stated and is subject to availability at the time of vehicle pick-up.
termsPage.reservationsText3: Vehicle categories may be substituted with an equivalent or higher category.
termsPage.reservationsText4: Xdrive reserves the right to cancel or decline reservations in cases of suspected fraud, technical error, or misuse.
termsPage.supplierText1: In addition to these Terms, each reservation is subject to supplier-specific and country-specific rental conditions applicable to the location where the vehicle is collected.
termsPage.supplierText2: Such rental conditions may include, without limitation, driver requirements, insurance coverage, deposits, fuel policies, mileage limits, cross-border travel rules, additional fees, and operational procedures, and may vary by country and Rental Provider.
termsPage.supplierText3: By completing a reservation, the Customer acknowledges and agrees that the relevant Rental Provider's rental conditions shall apply to the use of the vehicle and shall prevail with respect to vehicle use, insurance, deposits, and operational matters.
termsPage.supplierText4: Xdrive Mobility acts solely as a booking and payment facilitation platform and shall not be responsible for the content, enforcement, or application of such supplier-specific rental conditions.
termsPage.pricesText1: All payments are accepted by credit card only.
termsPage.pricesText2: A prepayment is collected via the Site.
termsPage.pricesText3: The remaining balance is paid directly to the Rental Provider at vehicle pick-up.
termsPage.pricesText4: The full rental amount is collected via the Site.
termsPage.pricesText5: Xdrive processes the payment and settles the amount with the Rental Provider.
termsPage.pricesText6: Additional charges, including but not limited to deposits, fuel differences, tolls, traffic fines, extras, or local taxes, may be charged directly by the Rental Provider.
termsPage.cancellationText1: Unless otherwise expressly stated at the time of booking, the following cancellation and refund terms shall apply:
termsPage.cancellationText2: The Customer may cancel the reservation free of charge up to 72 hours prior to the scheduled vehicle pickup date and time.
termsPage.cancellationText3: Cancellations made within 72 hours prior to the scheduled pickup time may be subject to cancellation fees, which may include partial or full retention of the advance payment, unless the Customer has purchased an optional cancellation protection at the time of booking.
termsPage.cancellationText4: Failure of the Customer to appear at the pickup location at the scheduled time ("no-show") shall be treated as a late cancellation and may result in partial or full charge, including forfeiture of any advance payment.
termsPage.cancellationText5: Any approved refund shall be processed to the original payment method used by the Customer within 1–3 business days, subject to the processing times of banks and payment service providers. Xdrive Mobility shall not be responsible for delays caused by third-party financial institutions.
termsPage.cancellationText6: Certain charges, including but not limited to service fees, optional extras, or third-party costs, may be non-refundable, as specified during the booking process.
termsPage.cancellationText7: In cases of force majeure or exceptional circumstances beyond the control of Xdrive Mobility (including but not limited to natural disasters, governmental restrictions, strikes, or system outages), refund eligibility shall be assessed on a case-by-case basis and subject to the policies of the relevant Rental Provider.
termsPage.driverText1: Customers must meet the Rental Provider's requirements, which may include, without limitation:
termsPage.driverList1: a valid driver's license accepted in the rental country (including international driving permit requirements, where applicable);
termsPage.driverList3: a valid credit card in the driver's name.
termsPage.driverText2: Additional driver requirements, conditions, or surcharges may apply depending on the Rental Provider and rental location.
termsPage.driverText3: Failure to meet these requirements may result in rental refusal without entitlement to a refund.
termsPage.vehicleText1: Vehicles are collected and returned directly through the Rental Provider.
termsPage.vehicleText2: Customers must inspect the vehicle at pick-up and return.
termsPage.vehicleText3: Any damages, losses, traffic violations, or penalties are the responsibility of the customer and the Rental Provider.
termsPage.vehicleText4: Xdrive is not involved in vehicle delivery, inspection, or return processes.
termsPage.insuranceText1: Insurance coverage and optional protections are determined solely by the Rental Provider.
termsPage.insuranceText2: Security deposits may be required at pick-up and blocked on the customer's credit card.
termsPage.insuranceText3: Xdrive does not provide insurance coverage.
termsPage.insuranceText4: All insurance claims and deposit disputes must be handled directly with the Rental Provider.
termsPage.liabilityText1: To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law:
termsPage.liabilityList1: Xdrive shall not be liable for vehicle condition, accidents, damages, theft, or personal injury;
termsPage.liabilityList2: Xdrive shall not be liable for acts or omissions of Rental Providers;
termsPage.liabilityList3: Xdrive shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages, including loss of profit or business interruption.
termsPage.liabilityText2: Nothing in these Terms limits mandatory consumer rights under applicable law.
termsPage.indemnificationText1: The customer agrees to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Xdrive Mobility, its owners, affiliates, directors, employees, and agents from and against any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, costs, and expenses (including reasonable legal fees) arising out of or related to:
termsPage.indemnificationList1: the customer's use of the vehicle;
termsPage.indemnificationList3: any violation of applicable laws or regulations;
termsPage.indemnificationList4: any third-party claims related to the rental or use of the vehicle.
termsPage.indemnificationText2: This obligation applies to the fullest extent permitted by law.
termsPage.partnershipText1: References to "partner", "partnership", or similar terms are used solely for commercial and descriptive purposes.
termsPage.partnershipText2: Nothing in these Terms shall be interpreted as creating a legal partnership, joint venture, agency, employment, or representative relationship between Xdrive Mobility and any Rental Provider or customer.
termsPage.thirdPartyText1: The Site may contain links to third-party services or websites.
termsPage.thirdPartyText2: Xdrive is not responsible for third-party content, services, or policies.
termsPage.ipText1: All Site content, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is owned by or licensed to Xdrive Mobility.
termsPage.dataText1: Personal data is processed in accordance with applicable data protection laws and Xdrive Mobility's Privacy Policy.
termsPage.dataText2: By using the Site, users consent to receiving electronic communications related to reservations and services.
termsPage.warrantyText1: The Site and services are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis without warranties of any kind.
termsPage.governingText1: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Turkey.
termsPage.governingText2: Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Istanbul, Turkey.
termsPage.generalText1: If any provision is held unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain valid.
termsPage.generalText3: These Terms constitute the entire agreement regarding use of the Site.
termsPage.contactText1: For questions regarding these Terms, please contact:

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.introText1: This Privacy Policy explains how Xdrive Mobility ("Xdrive", "we", "us", "our") collects, uses, stores, and protects personal data obtained through our website and related digital platforms (the "Site").
privacyPage.introText2: By using the Site or making a reservation, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy.
privacyPage.controllerText1: Xdrive Mobility, operated by Salih Yavuz, based in Istanbul, Türkiye, acts as the data controller for personal data processed through the Site in accordance with applicable data protection laws, including the Turkish Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 ("KVKK") and, where applicable, the EU General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR").
privacyPage.collectText1: We may collect the following categories of personal data:
privacyPage.collectList1: Identification details (name, surname, date of birth)
privacyPage.collectList3: Reservation details (rental dates, pickup location, vehicle category)
privacyPage.collectList4: Payment-related information (masked card details, transaction references)
privacyPage.collectList5: Technical data (IP address, device type, browser information)
privacyPage.collectText2: We do not store full credit card numbers. All payment data is processed securely by authorized third-party payment service providers.
privacyPage.purposeText1: Personal data is processed for the following purposes:
privacyPage.purposeList5: Complying with legal and regulatory obligations
privacyPage.purposeList6: Preventing fraud and ensuring platform security
privacyPage.basisText1: Personal data is processed based on one or more of the following legal grounds:
privacyPage.basisList1: Performance of a contract (reservation and booking facilitation)
privacyPage.basisList3: Legitimate interests (platform security, fraud prevention, service improvement)
privacyPage.sharingText1: Personal data may be shared with:
privacyPage.sharingList1: Independent local rental providers solely for reservation fulfillment and vehicle delivery
privacyPage.sharingList2: Payment service providers for transaction processing
privacyPage.sharingList3: IT, hosting, and infrastructure service providers
privacyPage.sharingList4: Legal or regulatory authorities where required by law
privacyPage.sharingText2: Rental Providers act as independent data controllers with respect to rental service execution.
privacyPage.sharingText3: As Xdrive operates globally, personal data may be transferred to countries outside the user's country of residence. Such transfers are carried out in accordance with applicable data protection laws and appropriate safeguards.
privacyPage.retentionText1: Personal data is retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy or to comply with applicable legal, tax, and regulatory obligations.
privacyPage.rightsText1: Subject to applicable law, users have the right to:
privacyPage.rightsList5: Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent
privacyPage.rightsText2: Requests related to data subject rights may be submitted using the contact details below.
privacyPage.cookiesText1: The Site uses cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze traffic, and enhance platform functionality.
privacyPage.cookiesText2: Where required by law, cookies are used only after obtaining user consent. Users may manage cookie preferences through browser settings or cookie management tools available on the Site.
privacyPage.securityText1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data against unauthorized access, loss, alteration, or misuse.
privacyPage.thirdPartyText1: The Site may contain links to third-party websites. Xdrive Mobility is not responsible for the privacy practices or content of such third-party sites.
privacyPage.changesText1: Xdrive Mobility reserves the right to update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes become effective upon publication on the Site.
privacyPage.contactText1: For questions, data subject requests, or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact:

preSaleAgreementPage.title: Pre-Sale & Advance Booking Agreement
preSaleAgreementPage.introText1: This Pre-Sale and Advance Booking Agreement ("Agreement") governs advance payments and reservations made through the Xdrive Mobility platform prior to vehicle pickup.
preSaleAgreementPage.introText2: By completing a reservation and making a payment on the Xdrive Mobility website, you ("Customer") acknowledge and agree to the terms set forth below.
preSaleAgreementPage.roleText1: Xdrive Mobility operates a brand-led vehicle rental booking, distribution, and payment facilitation platform.
preSaleAgreementPage.roleText2: Xdrive Mobility does not own, operate, lease, or rent vehicles. All rental vehicles and related services are provided and operated by local car rental providers ("Rental Providers").
preSaleAgreementPage.roleText3: The rental agreement governing the use of the vehicle shall be entered into directly between the Customer and the Rental Provider at the time of vehicle pickup.
preSaleAgreementPage.paymentText1: Depending on the selected payment option, the Customer may be required to:
preSaleAgreementPage.paymentSubTitle1: a) pay a partial advance payment ("Pay Part") via the Xdrive Mobility platform, with the remaining balance payable directly to the Rental Provider at vehicle pickup, or
preSaleAgreementPage.paymentSubTitle2: b) pay the full rental amount in advance ("Pay Full") via the Xdrive Mobility platform.
preSaleAgreementPage.paymentText2: All payments made through the platform are processed via secure credit card payment systems.
preSaleAgreementPage.confirmationText1: A reservation is considered confirmed once the Customer receives a written booking confirmation from Xdrive Mobility.
preSaleAgreementPage.confirmationText2: Reservation confirmation reflects booking acceptance but does not guarantee vehicle availability until vehicle pickup and completion of required checks by the Rental Provider, including but not limited to driver eligibility, documentation, and payment authorization.
preSaleAgreementPage.cancellationText1: Unless otherwise expressly stated at the time of booking:
preSaleAgreementPage.cancellationList1: Reservations may be cancelled free of charge up to 72 hours prior to the scheduled pickup time.
preSaleAgreementPage.cancellationList2: Cancellations made within 72 hours of pickup, including no-shows, may result in partial or full retention of any advance payment, unless an optional cancellation protection has been purchased at the time of booking.
preSaleAgreementPage.cancellationList3: Certain charges, including service fees or third-party costs, may be non-refundable as specified during the booking process.
preSaleAgreementPage.cancellationList4: Approved refunds, if applicable, shall be processed to the original payment method within 1–3 business days, subject to banking and payment provider processing times.
preSaleAgreementPage.cancellationList5: In cases of force majeure or circumstances beyond Xdrive Mobility's control, refund eligibility shall be assessed in accordance with the policies of the relevant Rental Provider.
preSaleAgreementPage.changesText1: Any changes to pickup date, time, location, vehicle category, or rental duration may result in price differences and are subject to availability and approval by the Rental Provider.
preSaleAgreementPage.changesText2: Xdrive Mobility does not guarantee the availability of requested changes.
preSaleAgreementPage.deliveryText1: Vehicle delivery, condition, insurance, deposits, fuel policy, mileage limits, and all operational aspects of the rental are the sole responsibility of the Rental Provider.
preSaleAgreementPage.deliveryText2: Xdrive Mobility bears no responsibility for vehicle condition, accidents, damages, traffic violations, or additional charges imposed by the Rental Provider.
preSaleAgreementPage.liabilityText1: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, Xdrive Mobility shall not be liable for:
preSaleAgreementPage.liabilityList3: acts or omissions of the Rental Provider,
preSaleAgreementPage.liabilityList4: delays, unavailability, or service disruptions beyond its control.
preSaleAgreementPage.liabilityText2: Xdrive Mobility's liability, if any, shall be limited to the amount paid by the Customer through the platform for the relevant reservation.
preSaleAgreementPage.responsibilitiesText1: The Customer is responsible for ensuring that all provided information is accurate and complete, and that all eligibility requirements imposed by the Rental Provider are met.
preSaleAgreementPage.responsibilitiesText2: Failure to meet such requirements may result in denial of vehicle pickup without entitlement to a refund.
preSaleAgreementPage.governingText1: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Türkiye, without regard to conflict of law principles.
preSaleAgreementPage.finalText1: This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the Customer and Xdrive Mobility with respect to pre-sale and advance booking arrangements and does not replace or override the rental agreement entered into with the Rental Provider.
preSaleAgreementPage.finalText2: By proceeding with payment, the Customer confirms that they have read, understood, and agreed to this Agreement.

deliveryReturnPolicy.title: Delivery & Return Policy
deliveryReturnPolicy.deliveryPolicy1: Vehicle delivery is carried out at the date, time, and location selected during the reservation.
deliveryReturnPolicy.deliveryPolicy2: The renter must present a valid driver’s license, passport/ID, and the credit card used for the booking at the time of delivery.
deliveryReturnPolicy.deliveryPolicy3: The vehicle is inspected at delivery, and any existing damages are recorded and shared with the renter.
deliveryReturnPolicy.deliveryPolicy4: In case of delays at the pickup time, the supplier’s waiting and late pickup policies will apply.
deliveryReturnPolicy.returnPolicy1: The vehicle must be returned at the agreed date, time, and location stated in the reservation.
deliveryReturnPolicy.returnPolicy2: Late returns may result in additional charges.
deliveryReturnPolicy.returnPolicy3: The vehicle should be returned with the same fuel level and in similar condition as received. Otherwise, extra fees may apply.
deliveryReturnPolicy.returnPolicy4: Any new damage occurring during the rental period is the responsibility of the renter.
deliveryReturnPolicy.returnPolicy5: Traffic fines, tolls, parking fees, and similar charges are the renter’s responsibility.
deliveryReturnPolicy.cancellation1: Free cancellation is available up to 72 hours before the scheduled pickup time.
deliveryReturnPolicy.cancellation2: Cancellations made within the 72 hours prior to pickup (including no-shows) require the purchase of optional cancellation protection at the time of booking; otherwise, advance payments may be partially or fully retained.
deliveryReturnPolicy.cancellation3: Any changes to pickup date, time, location, vehicle category, or rental duration may result in price differences and are subject to availability and approval by the Rental Provider.
